content: Hello! ¬†Up for auction are 2 sets of quite rare coldkey sets from 2019 - Design is based off the original Genesis cards - Original link here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5178951.msg52271257#msg52271257And this post further down ‚Ä¶ Which makes these ultra special/rare..  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5178951.msg52620945#msg52620945Quote3%-5% of the Loaded Coldkeys will be Gold, and 7%-10% will be Silver.90%-85% of the Loaded Coldkeys will be on plain cards, such as in the OP.That said, I barely knew yogg at the time, I just liked the cards, so I bought a few sets and got lucky I guess lol... Lastly, all the .005BTC cards are actually funded with 0.006BTC due to a programming error on his end. (Does it make an ‚Äúerror‚Äù? I‚Äôll let you decide lol)  Lot 1: GOLD & GOLD - Set #20 (This may be the only gold set, I‚Äôm not 100% sure).BTC-19.1M.20 & BTC-19.5M.20 (Year.Amount(mBTC).Serial Number)Click for bigger images:Packaging etc: Funding:BTC-19.1M.20 - 0.001BTC - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qckq29w0y56q3q3pkw3pzs5y35uvh5q0n7lct0gBTC-19.5M.20 - 0.006BTC - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qckqwx9eyp5fg7nqwd44kqawc2j592wfyj58d8pLot 2: SILVER & PINK - Set #21BTC-19-1M.21 & BTC-19.5M.21 (BTC-Year-Amount(mBTC).Serial Number)Click for bigger images:Packaging etc: Funding:BTC-19.1M.21 - 0.001BTC - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qckqzhdx7ys326fpn5sug3mkv0xa3ew43k8uxy8BTC-19.5M.21 - 0.006BTC - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qckqdmkl53k8vf7v23umvxnd8rjyqjtnmgtmccqStarting bid(s): 0.0 BTCMinimum bid increments: 0.001 BTCEnd time : Sunday, 23 October 2022, 15:00:00 (3PM EST - New York Time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes per lot before the auction end extend the auction an additional 10 minutes per lot. Shipping : USPS First Class USA - $5 First class (or your preference etc)Anywhere else: Depends on your shipping preferences, will have to let you know etc. Payment: Bitcoin Escrow with MoparMiningLLC , or your choice - winner pays fees/re-shipping etc.Thanks and Good luck!
